name: Counter-Strike 2
description: A premier competitive tactical first-person shooter with advanced physics and graphics.

name: ARC Raiders
description: A cooperative third-person shooter where players resist a mechanical threat from space.

name: EA SPORTS FC 26
description: The next chapter in the world's game, featuring unparalleled realism and top global leagues.

name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance II
description: A story-driven open-world RPG that immerses you in an epic adventure in Medieval Bohemia.

name: Dead by Daylight
description: A multiplayer horror game where one player is the killer and four others are survivors.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora
description: A first-person action-adventure game set in the open world of the Western Frontier of Pandora.

name: Marathon
description: A sci-fi extraction shooter from the creators of Halo and Destiny, set in a mysterious world.

name: NBA 2K26
description: Experience the highest level of basketball gameplay and culture in the latest NBA 2K installment.

name: Baldur's Gate 3
description: An epic, party-based RPG set in the universe of Dungeons & Dragons with deep storytelling.

name: Elden Ring
description: Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring in the Lands Between.

name: Helldivers 2
description: Join the Helldivers and fight for freedom across a hostile galaxy in a frantic third-person shooter.

name: Path of Exile 2
description: A next-generation Action RPG featuring a brand new campaign and significantly updated mechanics.

name: Silent Hill 2
description: A remake of the psychological horror classic, featuring a haunting atmosphere and disturbing mysteries.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6
description: An intense first-person shooter with a gripping campaign and competitive multiplayer action.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: An open-world adventure game where exploration and creativity are key to conquering challenges.

name: Starfield
description: A massive space exploration game where you can create your own character and explore thousands of star systems.

name: WWE 2K26
description: Experience the greatest professional wrestling entertainment with enhanced gameplay and updated rosters.

name: Street Fighter 6
description: A revolutionary fighting game with accessible gameplay and deep mechanics for all skill levels.
